overview: SOVHORROR is proud to present four gore-soaked tales of terror made by teen directors in I WAS A TEENAGE GOREHOUND! Featuring S.O.V. inspired shorts by Michael Bellamy, Gage Black, Stephen Bloodworth, and Ben Gaudet. Shorts include: Gore Collector, Backyard Mutilations, The Cross, and The Tape Of Karma. This collection is so sick it will leave you running for your barf bags.
title: I Was A Teenage Gorehound
